name: Survivor: Reimagine The Classics
description:
"Survivor: Reimagine The Classics" is a game that mixes two classics like Pinball and Arkanoid to the beat of music.

Hit the enemies, score high and try to beat your own record! Take advantage when enemies grow to hit as many as possible in the shortest time.

The current version is a beta, Survivor: Reimagine The Classics is still in development.

Music by A Himitsu https://soundcloud.com/a-himitsu
